title: I cant play LoL while streaming, but other games run good...
body:
Hello, I have a big problem...

Ive been streaming lol for one year with OBS and everything was great... but 2 weeks ago I started streaming and my Kb/s are dropping from normal (2000) to 150-300 every second. I tried everything... change option in lol, OBS but nothing works... Can anybody help me with that? 

I will give free skin for 975 for right advice.

My PC and Internet works good and I can stream other games for 2000-3000 without any problems... 

Thanks,
xMixet

(my english is so bad but i think u can understand it)

replies.body: Are you using OBS studio or regular?  I don't recall exactly, but isn't there an option on OBS to set your region?  It's possible that it reset to a hub that's further away from you, so it's taking longer for your network to transmit data.  Double check your OBS profile (might be same area you input your stream key) to make sure you're using the closest server. Also tune up your [connection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) a bit to make sure it's not unstable or degrading.  :O  Hope that helps!
